style: /* 强制全局背景 */ body { background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #0f0c29, #302b63, #24243e, #000000) !important; background-size: 400% 400% !important; animation: aurora 15s ease infinite !important; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', sans-serif !important; } /* 极光动画定义 */ @keyframes aurora { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* 卡片动画 */ @keyframes slideUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(40px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } .SideNav-item { animation: slideUp 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1) forwards; background: rgba(20, 20, 30, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .SideNav-item:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(88, 166, 255, 0.4); border-color: #58a6ff; } .avatar { border-radius: 50%; transition: transform 0.6s; } .avatar:hover { transform: rotate(360deg); }
head: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>
title: Fanhhh's IoT World
subTitle: 物联网 | 嵌入式 | 网络工程 | 硬核折腾

P1.style: /* 强制全局背景 */ body { background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #0f0c29, #302b63, #24243e, #000000) !important; background-size: 400% 400% !important; animation: aurora 15s ease infinite !important; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', sans-serif !important; } /* 极光动画定义 */ @keyframes aurora { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } } /* 卡片动画 */ @keyframes slideUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(40px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } .SideNav-item { animation: slideUp 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1) forwards; background: rgba(20, 20, 30, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .SideNav-item:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(88, 166, 255, 0.4); border-color: #58a6ff; } .avatar { border-radius: 50%; transition: transform 0.6s; } .avatar:hover { transform: rotate(360deg); }
P1.head: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>
